summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2949 for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue West, as established by Ordinance No. 32897, from Logan Avenue to West McGraw Street, and certain parts or certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 35594, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
